outputs.output_descr: The purpose of the National HCFC Phase out Management Plan (HPMP) is to develop and implement actions addressed  to eliminate the consumption of HCFCs, in accordance to the Decision XIX/6 of the  Montreal Protocol Parties.

project_descr: The purpose of the National HCFC Phase out Management Plan (HPMP) is to develop and implement actions addressed  to eliminate the consumption of HCFCs.
project_title: BRA/12/G76 - HCFC Phase Out National Programme
